name: Pong but Better
description:
The game created in 7 days using python and pygame. I start making it cuz i didn't knew what to do with python. Also i published my last game ~60 days ago. So i started development. To be honestly the most of time i was thinking about game ideas. I done full game (except sounds and some mini things) in ~3-4 days.

P.S: the game can be flagged as virus by some antiviruses. It's not a virus. If you don't trust me you can check source code. Im sharing it on github (link in links)
